content: > **please note ** the graph for this > pattern are free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graphs here 1 **description ** with halloween near it s time to start planning to accessorize with the gwendoline ghost bag you can take halloween with you all through october and any time you want this bag features 10 squares made in row of single_crochet from the bottom up seamed together and folded to make a fun and fashionable tote customize each square for a unique look or keep them all the same like the original it s up to you just remember to have fun with it this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com the sample in the photos was made in basic sttich by lion brand yarn affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 1 https //divinedebris com/gwendoline-ghost-bag-free-crochet-pattern/
